traits.name: Amphibious
entries: Crokek'toeck can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Crokek'toeck has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Secure Memory
entries: Crokek'toeck is immune to the waters of the River Styx as well as any effect that would steal or modify its memories or detect or read its thoughts.

traits.name: Standing Leap
entries: Crokek'toeck's long jump is up to 60 feet and its high jump is up to 30 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 44 (10d6 + 9 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Disgorge Allies {@recharge}
entries: Crokek'toeck opens its mouth and disgorges {@dice 1d4} {@creature barlgura||barlguras}, {@dice 3d6} {@creature gnoll||gnolls} led by 1 {@creature gnoll fang of Yeenoghu}, {@dice 6d6} {@creature dretch||dretches}, or {@dice 1d3} {@creature vrock||vrocks}. Each creature it disgorges appears in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of Crokek'toeck's mouth, or the next closest unoccupied space.
